name: The Vigilante: Single Shot Justice
description:
The Vigilante: Single Shot Justice is an interactive visual mystery novel, made for Ludum Dare 28: You Only Get One. In it, you play as a vigilante trying to stop a murder that she knows is going to happen.

Thematically, the correlation to the theme goes a lot deeper than just the title. We won't spoil how, you'll have to find out for yourself!

The game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 28 by Chris Klassen and Justin Wang of Magnesium Ninja, with music by Abstraction at https://soundcloud.com/abstraction (Made during the first 48 hours for participants).

Thanks for playing! Let us know what you think :)

Original Release Date: December 16, 2013

Post-mortem Commentary:

Our first and only visual novel project. Scrambling to get this done in 72 hours was a lot of fun in itself, and we hope you enjoy the final product.
